title: Ching Xian
text:
title: “YOU CAN CALL ME: CHING” image: profilepic.jpg about: template: jolla image-shape: round image-width: 15em links: - text: Email icon: envelope href: “mailto:e0775098@u.nus.edu” - text: Github icon: github href: https://github.com/ChingXian - text: Resume icon: file-text




I am a undergraduate at the National University of Singapore, currently in my third year studying Architecture. My passion lies in design and creativity. While my primary focus has been on architectural concepts and aesthetics, I am also enthusiastic about expanding my skill set to include coding and web development.
My goal is to acquire coding skills that will empower me to design and develop my own webpage. I am thrilled about the prospect of merging architectural design principles with interactive and user-friendly web interfaces.
Explore my website to discover more! Don’t hesitate to reach out if you have opportunities for internships, learning experiences in webpage development, or positions in architecture firms, art studios, or any design-related fields. I’m eager to discuss potential collaborations and opportunities, and my inboxis always open for exciting ventures in these domains.

title: About
text: I am currently a year3 undergraduate at the National University of Singapore, pursuing a Bachelor’s in Arts in Archiectture with a major in Architecture alongside a minor in Interactive Media Development.

title: About
text: I am currently a year3 undergraduate at the National University of Singapore, pursuing a Bachelor’s in Arts in Archiectture with a major in Architecture alongside a minor in Interactive Media Development.

title: About
text:
Hobbies.
I reside in the vibrant community of Raffles Hall. Sporting activities are a significant part of my routine, with badminton and table tennis being my go-to choices during leisure hours. Volunteering is another passion I pursue whenever time permits. Engaging in meaningful conversations and acquiring new knowledge bring me immense joy. Currently, I am delving into the world of animation creation using Procreate, and simultaneously, I’m exploring the art of webpage development through the NM2207 module.








My Journey in Architecture with my professors and unrelenting supports from my peers and family members.
